TextBody:
Hello Junichi,

Thank you for reaching out !!

In order to be able to share with you the EPP client for Ubuntu 22.04, we need to know the EPP server version. 

The version can be found on the EPP UI under the bottom right corner.

Looking forward for your response.

Best regards,
__________________
Daniel Anton | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | MDM | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
www.netwrix.com



This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.

Please note that we would like to use EPP client for Ubuntu *24.04*.

Best Regards,
Junichi

Thank you for getting back to us. 

Please use the below links to download the EPP clients for Ubuntu OS
